pkgmetadata.longdescription: lz-string-python================lz-string for python 2/3Based on the LZ-String javascript found here: http://pieroxy.net/blog/pages/lz-string/index.htmlExample-------:: >>> import lzstring >>> x = lzstring.LZString() >>> compressed = x.compressToBase64(u'你好') # 'gbyl9NI=' >>> x.decompressFromBase64(compressed) # '你好'Installation------------:: $ pip install lzstring
